statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE age > 18;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE age < 25 AND username LIKE '%e%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE age >= 30 AND age <= 40;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, age, movie_preferences FROM users WHERE age IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE movie_preferences @> ARRAY['comedy'];
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE movie_preferences @> ARRAY['action'];
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE movie_preferences && ARRAY['action', 'drama'];
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'alice' OR username = 'bob';
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age < 18 OR age > 60;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE movie_preferences @> ARRAY['action', 'comedy'];
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 20 AND age < 40 AND username NOT LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE age <= 20
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users WHERE age >= 18
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe' OR email = 'john.doe@example.com'
SELECT AVG(age) FROM users WHERE age IS NOT NULL
SELECT user_id, email, movie_preferences[1] FROM users WHERE array_length(movie_preferences, 1) > 3
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age IS NULL
SELECT username, ARRAY_LENGTH(movie_preferences, 1) AS num_preferences FROM users WHERE array_length(movie_preferences, 1) > 0
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username IN ('alice', 'bob', 'charlie')
SELECT DISTINCT age FROM users ORDER BY age
SELECT username, array_to_string(movie_preferences, ', ') AS movie_list FROM users WHERE array_length(movie_preferences, 1) > 0
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username ILIKE '%doe%'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 AND array_length(movie_preferences, 1) > 0
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM users
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT email) FROM users
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE age > 25 LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM users WHERE ARRAY['scifi', 'drama'] <@ movie_preferences
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, release_year FROM movies;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE release_year < 2000;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT movie_id, title FROM movies ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN movies ON users.user_id = movies.movie_id;
SELECT users.username, movies.title FROM users JOIN movies ON users.user_id = movies.movie_id;
SELECT users.username, movies.title FROM users INNER JOIN movies ON users.user_id = movies.movie_id;
SELECT users.username, movies.title FROM users LEFT JOIN movies ON users.user_id = movies.movie_id;
SELECT users.username, movies.title FROM users RIGHT JOIN movies ON users.user_id = movies.movie_id;
SELECT users.username, movies.title FROM users FULL JOIN movies ON users.user_id = movies.movie_id;
SELECT u.username, m.title FROM users AS u JOIN movies AS m ON u.user_id = m.movie_id;
SELECT u.username, m.title FROM users AS u JOIN movies AS m ON u.user_id = m.movie_id WHERE m.genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT u.username, m.title FROM users AS u JOIN movies AS m ON u.user_id = m.movie_id ORDER BY m.release_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, movie_preferences -> 'genre' AS favorite_genre FROM users WHERE movie_preferences -> 'genre' = 'Action';
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Comedy' AND release_year > 2000;
SELECT m.title, m.release_year, u.username FROM movies m JOIN users u ON m.title = u.movie_preferences ->> 'favorite_movie';
SELECT u.username, m.title FROM users u LEFT JOIN movies m ON u.user_id = m.movie_id;
SELECT u.username AS user, m.title AS movie, COUNT(m.title) AS movies_count FROM users u JOIN movies m ON u.movie_preferences ->> 'favorite_movie' = m.title GROUP BY u.username, m.title;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) AS total FROM users u JOIN movies m ON u.movie_preferences ->> 'favorite_genre' = m.genre GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT u.username FROM users u JOIN movies m ON u.movie_preferences ->> 'favorite_genre' = m.genre WHERE m.release_year > 2010 AND m.genre = 'Action';
SELECT u.username AS user, AVG(m.release_year) AS avg_release_year FROM users u JOIN movies m ON u.movie_preferences ->> 'favorite_movie' = m.title GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT u.username, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(u.movie_preferences -> 'genre') AS genre_count FROM users u;
SELECT u.username, JSONB_OBJECT_KEYS(u.movie_preferences) AS preferences_key FROM users u;
SELECT u.username, JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(u.movie_preferences -> 'genre') AS genres FROM users u;
SELECT u.username, JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS_TEXT(u.movie_preferences -> 'genre') AS genres_text FROM users u;
SELECT DISTINCT JSONB_OBJECT_KEYS(u.movie_preferences) AS preferences_key FROM users u;
SELECT username, JSONB_OBJECT_AGG(key, value) AS preferences FROM users CROSS JOIN LATERAL JSONB_EACH(movie_preferences);
SELECT u.username, m.title FROM users u, LATERAL (SELECT title FROM movies WHERE m.genre = u.movie_preferences ->> 'favorite_genre') m;
SELECT u.username, m.title FROM users u CROSS JOIN LATERAL (SELECT title FROM movies WHERE genre = u.movie_preferences ->> 'favorite_genre' LIMIT 1) m;
SELECT u.username, m.title FROM users u LEFT JOIN LATERAL (SELECT title FROM movies WHERE genre = u.movie_preferences ->> 'favorite_genre' LIMIT 1) m ON TRUE;
SELECT u.username, m.title FROM users u RIGHT JOIN LATERAL (SELECT title FROM movies WHERE genre = u.movie_preferences ->> 'favorite_genre' LIMIT 1) m ON TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, location FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_name, movie_title FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id;

SELECT user_name, genre FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE genre = 'Comedy';

SELECT user_name, movie_title FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id ORDER BY user_name ASC;

SELECT user_name, movie_title FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id ORDER BY movie_title DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM users;
SELECT user_name, location FROM users WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' OR location = 'San Francisco';

SELECT user_name, movie_title, release_year FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(movie_id) AS num_movies_watched FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id GROUP BY user_name;

SELECT user_name, AVG(release_year) AS avg_release_year FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id GROUP BY user_name;

SELECT user_name, movie_title, genre FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%';

SELECT user_name, movie_title, genre FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE user_name LIKE '%Anna%' AND genre = 'Action';

SELECT user_name, movie_title, location FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles');

SELECT user_name, movie_title, release_year, genre FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010;

SELECT user_name, movie_title, genre FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE genre IN ('Comedy', 'Drama');

SELECT user_name, movie_title, genre FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE user_name = 'Alice' OR user_name = 'Bob';

SELECT user_name, movie_title, genre FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE user_name <> 'Alice';
SELECT user_name, COUNT(movie_id) AS num_movies_watched FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id WHERE user_name = 'Alice' GROUP BY user_name;

SELECT user_name, movie_title, release_year FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE user_name = 'Bob' AND release_year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_name, location FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT user_name, movie_title FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE users.user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name AS name, location AS city FROM users WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY user_name ASC;

SELECT user_name, location, movie_title, genre FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE genre = 'Action' AND release_year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT AVG(release_year) AS average_year FROM movies;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(movie_id) AS total_movies FROM user_movie_preferences GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(movie_id) AS total_movies FROM user_movie_preferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(movie_id) > 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(movie_id) AS total_movies FROM user_movie_preferences GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_movies DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_movie_preferences);
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_preferences FROM user_movie_preferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

SELECT user_id, movie_title, genre FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_movie_preferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2);
SELECT user_name, location FROM users WHERE LENGTH(user_name) > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE movie_preferences LIKE '%Drama%';
SELECT user_id, user_name, COUNT(movie_id) AS total_movies FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id GROUP BY user_id, user_name;

SELECT user_id, AVG(release_year) AS avg_year FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT genre) AS unique_genres FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT location, AVG(release_year) AS avg_year FROM users JOIN user_movie_preferences ON users.user_id = user_movie_preferences.user_id JOIN movies ON user_movie_preferences.movie_id = movies.movie_id GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(release_year) > 2015;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(p.movie_id) AS num_ratings FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_movie_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT m.title, m.director, AVG(p.rating) AS avg_rating FROM movies m JOIN user_movie_preferences p ON m.movie_id = p.movie_id GROUP BY m.title, m.director;
SELECT u.username, m.title, p.rating FROM users u JOIN user_movie_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN movies m ON p.movie_id = m.movie_id WHERE u.username = 'Alice' AND p.rating > 3;
SELECT u1.username AS user1, u2.username AS user2 FROM user_connections c JOIN users u1 ON c.user_id1 = u1.user_id JOIN users u2 ON c.user_id2 = u2.user_id WHERE c.isConnected = true;
